interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Tirtyl Hand Soap Sheet Variety Pack - 240 Pack with Portable Storage Tin - Camping/Outdoor/Travel/Handbag - Lavender & Aloe - Bergamot & Ylang Ylang - Jasmine & Patchouli
Review Date: 2021/07/25
Store: Tirtyl
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Tirtyl', 'Scent': 'Bergamot,Lavender,Jasmine', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '240.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9.88 x 6.26 x 0.75 inches; 3.21 Ounces'}
Review Text: This set contains 3 packs of soap sheets with the following scents/fragrances: Lavender & Aloe, Bergamot & Ylang Ylang, Jasmine & Patchouli. There are 80 sheets in each pack. The sheets are thin and dissolve easily with water. It provides a good amount of lather and smells wonderful. I used the Jasmine & Patchouli scent today and it's pretty long lasting. My hands felt clean, soft, and moisturized afterwards. This set comes with a storage tin so it's perfect for traveling or camping.
Review Title: Dissolves easily, smells great, and provides a good lather....
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Glass Spray Bottles 16oz Refillable Container suitable for essential oils, cleaning products, aromatherapy, water mist plants (2 Pack，Blue) RONGCHUANG {'Brand': 'RONGCHUANG', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '2.76 x 2.76 x 8.27 inches', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 2.76 x 8.27 inches; 1.36 Pounds', 'UPC': '768253664713'} I got these to replace a bottle of cleaning solution that no longer worked. These bottles are made of glass so they are much sturdier than the typical plastic bottles. The blue glass also looks more "elegant" on a countertop if you plan to display it. There are 2 spray settings (fine mist and stream). I didn't have any issues with leaking. It comes with 2 16 oz bottles, 4 labels, 2 caps, and a funnel (not pictured because I somehow misplaced it already). Looks nice on the counter GERSHION Pastel Gel Nail Polish Set, 6 Colors Gel Polish Set, Soak Off UV Lamp Gel Polish Kit, Nude Pink Yellow Green Color Nail Polish Kit, 7.5ml Gel Polish Kit H-10 GERSHION {'Brand': 'GERSHION', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Color': 'Blue,Green,Pastel,Pink,Purple', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Special Feature': 'Long-lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.5 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Package Dimensions': '4.53 x 3.27 x 3.15 inches; 9.74 Ounces'} This is a great set of 6 bright, pastel colored gel polishes. Each bottle has a sticker on top to mark the color, which is 100% accurate. The polish is on the thicker side so you only need 1-2 coats for opacity. These will be my go to all summer long! Beautiful pastel colors! MISS SPA Head to Toe Body and Facial Mask Set, Brighten Under-Eye, Deep Therapy Lip Mask, Moisturizing Foot Booties, Anti-Aging, Anti-Wrinkle, Skin Care for Women, 3-Pack MISS SPA {'Brand': 'MISS SPA', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Skin Type': 'Dry,All Skin Types', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Product Dimensions': '3.07 x 0.24 x 4.33 inches; 2.15 Ounces', 'UPC': '838623303099'} This combo set comes with 3 different “spa” treats: a set of eye patches, feet masks and lip mask. It has a you need to pamper you’re self from head to toe. Here are my 2 cents on each:

Lip mask - it’s big and easily for around my entire mouth. Felt nice and moisturizing on my lips. Leaves you unable to talk for at least 20 min

Feet mask - smells like eucalyptus… nice and cooling on my feet… there are tabs on the side to hold them in place. Feet felt so soft and moisturized after removal. There was no dry spot in sight. I rubbed the rest of the serum all over my legs.

Eye patch - cool and soothing on my face… stays in place even with me moving around freely. Nice combo set Tirtyl Hand Soap Sheet Variety Pack - 240 Pack with Portable Storage Tin - Camping/Outdoor/Travel/Handbag - Lavender & Aloe - Bergamot & Ylang Ylang - Jasmine & Patchouli Tirtyl {'Brand': 'Tirtyl', 'Scent': 'Bergamot,Lavender,Jasmine', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '240.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9.88 x 6.26 x 0.75 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} This set contains 3 packs of soap sheets with the following scents/fragrances: Lavender & Aloe, Bergamot & Ylang Ylang, Jasmine & Patchouli. There are 80 sheets in each pack. The sheets are thin and dissolve easily with water. It provides a good amount of lather and smells wonderful. I used the Jasmine & Patchouli scent today and it's pretty long lasting. My hands felt clean, soft, and moisturized afterwards. This set comes with a storage tin so it's perfect for traveling or camping. Dissolves easily, smells great, and provides a good lather....
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Continues to favor glass containers for their durability and aesthetic appeal, with a growing interest in skincare products that provide comprehensive pampering for both body and face. There's also a notable preference for multifunctional, portable products suitable for travel, reflecting a desire for convenience alongside high-quality, functional cosmetics.

- **Style & Aesthetics:** Maintains a strong appreciation for items that enhance home decor and self-care routines. The recent engagement with skincare and personal care products highlights a commitment to elegance and self-pampering, incorporating stylish, practical solutions into their beauty and hygiene regimens.

- **Practicality:** Values versatility in items that cater to various needs, including skincare essentials that offer hydration and comfort. The inclination towards portable products suggests a desire for practicality without sacrificing style, marking a shift towards on-the-go solutions.

- **Quality Consciousness:** Continues to prioritize durable, non-toxic materials, now complemented by a focus on effective hand care that is convenient and pleasant to use, in alignment with sustainable product choices.

- **Organizational Traits:** Enjoys neatly labeled and organized products, now extending this to accessible skincare items. The preference for travel-friendly packaging underscores a need for convenience without compromising aesthetics.

- **User Experience:** Values products that deliver an effective and seamless experience, whether in personal care or household use, aligning with the recent choice for easily dissolvable, skin-friendly options.

Overall, the user emphasizes high-quality, stylish, and practical products that enhance self-care and everyday convenience.
